project with testcase

I'll mark this as a duplicate as well.  We've already been talking about returning null rather than throwing an exception from ClassifierImpl.getInstanceClass.  Either that, or we need to catch this exception during the validation, which seems not so nice.  When we complete the constraint work, we'll ensure that all the duplicate bugzilla issues have also been addressed.  Keep in mind that instance classes themselves often are not available a development time...

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 75933 ***
